articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a reply message from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), on November 1.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the C.C., the CPC and on my own behalf, express sincere thanks to the C.C., the WPK and Comrade Chairman for respectively sending congratulatory messages as regards the facts that the 19th National Congress of the CPC was held and I was elected general secretary of the C.C., the CPC and took office as chairman of the Central Military Commission again some days ago.
					
					 I wish that under the new situation the Chinese side would make efforts with the DPRK side to promote the relations between the two parities and the two countries to sustainable soundness and stable development and thus make a positive contribution to providing the peoples of the two countries with more wonderful happiness and defending regional peace and stability and common prosperity.
					
					 I wish the Korean people steadily fresh successes in the cause of socialist construction under the leadership of the WPK headed by Chairman Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Anti-DPRK Military Confab Denounced
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Anti-DPRK Military Confab Denounced
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement Thursday denounced the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers for holding frequent confabs and getting keen on kicking up the war racket for aggression of the DPRK in a bid to bring it down by force.
					 Recently the U.S. Defense Secretary Mattis and the puppet Defense Minister Song Yong Mu at the 49th annual consultative meeting in Seoul had a discussion on such issues as sharing information on "missile threats from north Korea", the operation of THAAD deployed in south Korea, the expansion of the cyclic deployment of the U.S. strategic assets on the Korean peninsula, and intensifying joint military exercises like the U.S. nuclear carrier task force drill, ballistic missile warning drill and anti-submarine drill, and agreed to further mutual cooperation.
					
					 Earlier, the chairmen of the U.S. and the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff at the 42nd military commission session discussed the way of joint operation to cope with the "nuclear and missile threats from north Korea", measure for strengthening mutual operation of combined command control system C41 and the way of revising joint operational plan targeting the DPRK "OPLAN 5015".
					
					 This proves that the meetings described as annual ones were just dangerous military gatherings to spur the frantic moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Being taken aback by the might of the DPRK, the U.S. thinks of holding the puppet forces under its tighter control under the pretext of "tightened alliance" and use them as cannon fodder for a war of aggression against the DPRK. This is the invariable purpose of the U.S. The puppet forces, on the other hand, seek to rise from their military inferiority with the help of their master and thus realize their ambition for the invasion of the north. This is their foolish ambition.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the confabs were held at a time when the U.S. is straining the tension to the maximum by introducing three nuclear carrier strike groups and nuclear strategic assets into waters off the Korean peninsula and around it.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces' increased military nexus will only reveal their disgusting nature as warmongers destroying peace on the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 The aggressors and provokers must understand that whatever military confabs they have, they will just be useless armchair talks before the army and people of the DPRK full of annihilating will to make retaliatory blows at the enemies, and wake up from the wild dream.

articles.title: Letter of DPRK Permanent Representative Distributed as UN Document
articles.content:
Letter of DPRK Permanent Representative Distributed as UN Document
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A letter sent by the DPRK permanent representative at the United Nations to the UN secretary general was distributed as an official document A/72/546-S/2017/894 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on October 30.
					 The letter requested urgently organizing an international forum of legal experts to clarify the legal grounds of the UN Security Council's "sanctions resolutions" against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK).

articles.title: "Tanbaekcho" High in Productivity and Nutritive Value
articles.content:
"Tanbaekcho" High in Productivity and Nutritive Value
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- It is gaining momentum throughout the DPRK to cultivate a new variety of vegetable with superior biological characteristics and economic value.
					 It was named "Tanbaekcho" by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in the meaning of being rich in protein during his visit to a farm in September.
					
					 "Tanbaekcho" is a perennial plant with thick root and is highly resistant to unfavorable conditions.
					
					 For being rich in protein and having the strong effect of anti-oxidation, it is considered to be efficacious for cardiovascular diseases, pulmonary emphysema and diabetes.
					
					 It grows well even in the area with low precipitation and sterile land as it can survive at 30 degrees Centigrade below zero and roots three meters deep.
					
					 It bears 5 or 6 crops a year.

articles.title: Japan TV Asahi Blasted for Releasing Misinformation about DPRK: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Japan TV Asahi Blasted for Releasing Misinformation about DPRK: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Japan is behaving childish while dancing to the tunes of the U.S. keen on stifling the DPRK.
					 Recently the Japanese authorities let the TV Asahi report that a "pit collapsed" in Phunggye-ri nuclear test ground, claiming lives of a great number of people. They even let it release a false report that the cause of the collapse is thought to be attributable to the "nuclear test".
					
					 This clearly proves that the U.S. and the Japanese reactionaries have gone desperate to slander the DPRK politically and morally, now that they find it hard to check the DPRK's development of a nuclear force through military threat and barbarous sanctions.
					
					 The DPRK, which made the development of a nuclear force at a high stage after having access to even H-bomb with its own efforts and technology, becomes the might representing independence and justice for the world progressive people but deadly sledge-hammer blow to the enemies.
					
					 Whenever the DPRK took measures for bolstering the capabilities for self-defence to put a fundamental end to the U.S. hostile policy toward it, the Japanese reactionaries, not knowing where to draw line, spoke for the U.S. and went busy, getting vociferous about "threats" from someone. This is a well-known fact.
					
					 It is none other than the Japanese reactionaries who put interceptor missiles on a permanent deployment even within the premises of the government building under the pretext of the ballistic rocket launch by the DPRK. They even mobilized ordinary citizens engaged in their work for livelihood for an evacuation drill, while staging drills for deployment of "Patriot" interceptor missiles one after another.
					
					 The Japanese authorities resort to a trite method to convince the public that the national trouble was caused by "nuclear threats" from the DPRK even though it was attributable to the worst government administration. When taking this into account, we can not but take note of one fact which is wide spread across Japan.
					
					 There happened the U.S. forces' helicopter accident in Okinawa recently, reminding one of the accidental fire of nuclear-tipped ground-to-air missile "Nike Hercules" by the U.S. forces there in 1959, and this has put the Japanese authorities into hot water.
					
					 The Okinawa Prefectural governor on Oct. 24 asserted that "it is trouble of Okinawa that it is suffering such damage from the state", claiming that there are no probe into the cause nor measure for improvement from the U.S. forces even though there occurs U.S. helicopter accidents one after another in the prefecture.
					
					 The controversial report about misinformation is also part of the Japanese reactionaries' clumsy trick to divert elsewhere the heated-up public attention.
					
					 Several media openly complain, branding the Japanese reactionaries' moves to render the fictitious story about "threat from the north" extremely serious as a frivolous act peculiar to Japan aimed to justify their arms buildup.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by Japan.
					
					 They seek to secure a pretext for sending the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" into the Korean peninsula on their own initiative by building up the public opinion over "nuclear threat" from the DPRK and thus create a foundation for realizing the ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries behaving mischievous while clinging to the coattail of the U.S. should clearly understand the strategic position of the DPRK which has reached the highest stage, and face up to the situation and should refrain from going reckless by citing the DPRK as a pretext.
					
					 If catastrophic consequences beyond imagination are entailed by the shower of retaliatory fire, the TV Asahi will also be made to pay a dear price for its sordid act as it resorts to smear campaign, not discerning the trend of the times.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning Out in Autumn Land Management Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning Out in Autumn Land Management Campaign
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday editorially appeals to all the people to turn out in the autumn land management campaign.
					 It says:
					
					 The land management campaign is a far-sighted patriotic work for the country's prosperity and a noble work to provide the people with better living environment.
					
					 Now the reckless moves of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces to trample down the DPRK's sovereignty and rights to existence and development have reached their height.
					
					 So, it is the intention of the Party at present to decisively foil the enemies' sinister sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and bring the development of the revolution to a new peak by further increasing its strength under the uplifted banner of independence and self-reliance.
					
					 Only when all the people make revolutionary changes in the campaign so as to convert every part of the country into new fairylands can they deal a telling blow at the hostile forces and successfully conclude this year's struggle to victory.
					
					 They remain steadfast in their will to give full play to the heroic spirit of Juche Korea advancing and winning by dint of self-reliance in the autumn campaign.
					
					 All the people should make greater achievements in the campaign by displaying their ardent patriotic will to the maximum.

articles.title: Trump's "Crazy Strategy" under Fire
articles.content:
Trump's "Crazy Strategy" under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary discloses the essence of the "crazy strategy" pursued by U.S. President Trump.
					 Noting that Trump is openly pursuing the "crazy strategy" which totally negates the universally accepted orders and norms of human society with the "privilege" of the U.S. president, the commentary says:
					
					 The "crazy strategy" is the maximum strategy of highhanded and arbitrary practices and terrorism based on the policy of strength steadily pursued by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S., the empire of evil, put forward Trump to prolong its shagging destiny at any cost. And Trump is charmed by the "crazy strategy" in full line with his frantic disposition and regards it as "powerful means" for "America first" policy. 
					
					 It is a big mistake for the Trump administration to think that the target of the "strategy" is those countries like the DPRK which are extremely hostile relationship with the U.S.
					
					 The "strategy" is applied not only to its hostile countries but also to its allies and close associates.
					
					 Those countries styling themselves as big powers are not excepted from its target.
					
					 However, now in the international community there are not a few countries which curry favor with the rogue country running amuck unafraid of harsh punishment, far from counteracting to its vicious moves.
					
					 Some countries despicably behave without moral principles and conscience, seeking immediate interests, although they see the serious harm of Trump's reckless moves to peace and development of human society. Herein lies the foolish attempt to evade the "crazy strategy" of the U.S., compromising and submitting to it.
					
					 Concession, submission and compromise to the arbitrariness of the villain breaking justice, order, civilization and progress of human society are the weakest and foolish behavior of pricking one's own eyes with one's own fingers.
					
					 It is the well-known fact that the main target of the "crazy strategy" of the Trump administration is the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and it is leaving no means untried to bring down the DPRK.
					
					 But, the DPRK, honored with the tradition of steady victory in the standoff with the brigandish U.S. imperialists century after century, regards Trump's reckless acts of which the international community is afraid as last-ditch efforts of the rabid dog.
					
					 If the old lunatic of the U.S. dares provoke the DPRK with misunderstanding, it will fall down earlier.
					
					 Anyone who really wants world peace and stability and loves justice and truth should clearly distinguish the right from the wrong and bravely have one's own way with principles.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-DPRK Racket
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-DPRK Racket
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Before and after the recent election of the House of Representatives, the Japanese reactionaries had loudly talked about "threat from the north" and "issue of abduction of Japanese", staging a hysteric anti-DPRK racket.
					 Visiting the election campaign rally places, Abe asserted that the "north's nuclear and missile provocation" is a "serious threat" to Japan and called on the voters to "support" the regime of the Liberal Democratic Party capable of "resolutely coping with the threat". And he incited the anti-DPRK confrontational atmosphere, talking about the "issue of abduction".
					
					 Meanwhile, the Abe group is advertising that during Trump's junket to Japan, it will place the "north's nuclear and missile threat" and "issue of abduction" on the key agenda and ask for stronger pressure upon the north".
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Thursday discloses that the Japanese reactionaries have historically made desperate efforts to mislead the public opinion at home and abroad through their anti-DPRK smear campaign whenever they were driven into the crisis and thus prolong their remaining days under such pretext.
					
					 It is the height of shame for the Japanese reactionaries to justify their anachronistic moves for militarism under the pretext of "nuclear threat from the north" and zealously join in the U.S. anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 Tragic is that the Abe group is doing dangerous gambling at the risk of the future of Japan and lives of its people.
					
					 If it runs amuck in the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK, in tune with Trump's crazy remarks, the islands of Japan as a whole may be thrown into the bottom of sea.

articles.title: U.S. Surprise Nuclear Strike Drill in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Surprise Nuclear Strike Drill in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- The gangster-like U.S. imperialists are ceaselessly resorting to their frantic nuclear threat and blackmail to stifle the DPRK with nukes at any cost.
					 On Thursday they let a formation of B-1B nuclear strategic bombers stationed at the Anderson Air Force Base on Guam stealthily fly into south Korea again to stage a surprise nuclear strike drill targeting the DPRK.
					
					 The bombers made flight through Okinawa of Japan and changed direction from the Jeju Island of the south Korea to the East Sea of Korea. Then they flew into the Sangdong firing range, under cover of fighters of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet air forces, to conduct a nuclear bomb dropping drill simulating attack on major targets of the DPRK.
					
					 The gravity of the situation is that the above-said drill was staged when the U.S. super-large nuclear-powered carrier Ronald Reagan task force remains still in waters around the Korean peninsula, after having joint naval exercises with the south Korean puppet forces in the East Sea of Korea, and Theodore Roosevelt and Nimitz nuclear-powered carriers strike groups of the U.S. concentrate in the operational theater of its 7th Fleet.
					
					 The reality clearly shows that the gangster-like U.S. imperialists are the very one who is aggravating the situation of the Korean peninsula and seeking to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are making last-ditch efforts to check the dynamic advance of the DPRK by deploying their nuclear strategic assets in succession, but its army and people are never frightened at such moves.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers should not act rashly.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Slams Trump' War Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Slams Trump' War Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Minjok Ilbo, the Anti-Trump, Anti-U.S. Action Headquarters held a meeting in Puchon of Kyonggi Province to denounce Trump's war moves against the DPRK on October 28.
					 The participants in the meeting declared that they would launch a campaign against Trump and the U.S. across south Korea, saying that it is necessary to make Trump clearly heed the voices of the people opposing a war and aspiring after peace.
					
					 The organization released a statement in which it warned that if Trump kicks off a war through escalating the tension, the anti-Trump, anti-U.S. resistance will grow fiercer.

articles.title: S. Korean Youths Say No to Trump's Visit
articles.content:
S. Korean Youths Say No to Trump's Visi
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A south Korean youth group called press conferences in Seoul and Washington on Oct. 30 and 31 and issued a joint statement against Trump's trip to south Korea, according to the south Korean online paper Saram Ilbo.
					 The statement demanded that Trump quit office as president at an early date to prevent a war on the Korean peninsula and ensure global peace.
					
					 There is no room in south Korea for Trump, the statement said, adding:
					
					 If Trump finally makes a trip to south Korea, he will come to clearly know how angry the people are.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national committee for remembering HE Kim Jong Il was formed in Abuja on October 18.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce the revolutionary career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and the achievements made by the Korean people in defending the sovereignty of the country and building a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and hold political and cultural events including remembrance meeting and film show on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Russian Website on Role of UN
articles.content:
Russian Website on Role of UN
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- An article titled "For Whom the UN Works?" was posted on the Russian website DPRK Today on Oct. 25.
					 Recalling that October 24 is the Day of the United Nations, the article said:
					
					 The international community expected the UN to contribute to global peace and security and prosperity of mankind as required by its mission.
					
					 But so many wars, skirmishes, armed clashes and state-backed terrorism have been witnessed in various parts of the world for the past 70-odd years since the founding of the UN. The Jungle Law has denied the principle of equal sovereignty under its connivance.
					
					 This means that the UN has not done its bit. In another word, it is a proof that the goal and principle of the UN have been disregarded.
					
					 Gravity of the issue is the behavior of the UN Security Council which is acting contrary to the mission of the UN.
					
					 The U.S. in a particular position in the UN and some other members of the Security Council have used the UN as a lever for seeking their own interests.
					
					 The U.S. unjust acts of abusing the UN as a tool for realizing its strategy for monopolizing and dominating the world have reached their height.
					
					 Due to the insincere role of the UN yielding to the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices, serious socio-political chaos and disorders and serious crises in the humanitarian aspect like refugee crisis have been created across the world.
					
					 Now the world asks the UN for whom it works.
					
					 The UN should fully discharge its mission and role as desired by mankind aspiring after peace and development.

articles.title: Honorary Title Awarded to Kim Jong Un in Romania
articles.content:
Honorary Title Awarded to Kim Jong Un in Romania
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was awarded the honorary title "Eternal Creator of Peace" by the Romanian Committee for Praising Heroes.
					 The chairman of the Romanian Committee conveyed a certificate of the title to the DPRK ambassador to Romania on October 27.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe el mensaje de respuesta de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe el mensaje de respuesta de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio el dia primero un mensaje de respuesta de Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En representacion del CC de PCCh y en el mi nombre propio expreso de todo corazon el profundo agradecimiento al Comite Central y al Presidente del PTC por enviar hace poco los mensajes de felicitacion con respecto a la realizacion del XIX Congreso del PCCh y mi reeleccion como el Secretario General de CC de PCCh y Presidente del Comision Militar Central.
					
					Deseo que bajo la nueva situacion la parte china se esforzara junto con la parte coreana por impulsar el desarrollo permanente, sano y estable de las relaciones de los dos partidos y dos paises haciendo aporte activo a la preparacion de la felicidad mas excelente para los pueblos de ambos paises y a la defensa de la paz y estabilidad regionales y la prosperidad comun.
					
					Deseo que el pueblo coreano logre sin cesar los nuevos exitos en la causa de construccion del socialismo bajo la direccion del PTC, encabezado por el Presidente Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Vocero de CNCDP condena la confabulacion militar anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Vocero de CNCDP condena la confabulacion militar anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz publico el dia 2 una declaracion condenando a EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos que en estos dias se dedican a los alborotos de  guerra agresiva anti-RPDC haciendo frecuentes conspiraciones contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En la reciente 49a reunion consultiva anual de seguridad, realizada en Seul, Mattis, secretario de Defensa de Estados Unidos, y Song Yong Mu, ministro de Defensa Nacional surcoreano, discutieron los problemas por la consolidacion de la cooperacion mutua entre otros como el problema de compartimiento de informaciones sobre la "amenaza de misiles del Norte (de Corea)", el de administracion de operacion de THAAD, estacionado en el Sur de Corea y de la ampliacion de la ubicacion de las propiedades estrategicas nucleares norteamericanas que se ubican de manera rotativa en la Peninsula Coreana, el ejercicio de fortalecer los ejercicios militares conjuntos como el entrenamiento de flotilla de ataque de portaaviones nucleares norteamericanos y el de alarma de misiles balisticas, el de batalla contra submarinos.
					
					Con anterioridad a eso, los presidentes de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea realizaron la 42a reunion militar, ocasion en la cual conspiraron secretamente el plan de operacion conjunta frente a la "amenaza nuclear y de misiles del Norte", las medidas de fortalecimiento de operacion mutua del sistema de control de mando conjunto C41 y el proyecto de renovacion de "OPLAN 5015", plan de operacion conjunta de agresion al Norte.
					
					Esto demuestra claramente que estas reuniones, efectuadas bajo pretexto anual, fueron la peligrosa conspiracion militar para acelerar mas las maniobras de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC, realizadas cada dia mas freneticamente.
					
					Atemorizados con el poderio de la RPDC, EE.UU. tiene el invariable objeto de tomar en su mano a los titeres surcoreanos para utilizarlos como carne de canon de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC bajo el pretexto del "fortalecimiento de la alianza" y resultan ironico el intento de los titeres surcoreanos que tratan de recuperar su inferioridad militar y realizar su ambicion de agresion al norte en confabulacion con su amo yanqui.
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que esta discusion coincide en el mismo tiempo con que EE.UU. se lleva a la extremidad la tension introduciendo los 3 colectivas de golpe de portaaviones nucleares y otras propiedades estrategicas nucleares en la Peninsula Coreana y sus alrededores.
					
					Cuanto mas se fortalezca la confabulacion militar entre EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, tanto mas se revelaran la   naturaleza sucia de los belicistas que destruyen la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y de region.
					
					Los agresores y provocadores deben despertarse de su sueno ilusorio teniendo bien presente de que sus cualesquier complots miliares no pasan de ser una palabreria inutil ante el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC, armados con la voluntad de aniquilar al enemigo.
